title: India set to see biggest jump in coal-fired power in a decade
description: India is set to add 15.4 gigawatts of new coal power capacity this year, the most in nearly a decade, to meet rising electricity demand. Despite clean-power goals, coal remains vital due to economic growth and severe heat waves. Challenges in energy storage hinder renewable expansion, with slow progress in alternative technologies.
